about_the_game:
Demo for "High Dragon Tower" featuring the initial stages and bosses of the game.

Use your platforming skills to flap the dragon's wing and climb the high tower. Find the treasures with random loot to upgrade your weapons and face the onslaught of vile dragons upwards ever changing vertical corridors.
detailed_description:
Demo for "High Dragon Tower" featuring the initial stages and bosses of the game.

Use your platforming skills to flap the dragon's wing and climb the high tower. Find the treasures with random loot to upgrade your weapons and face the onslaught of vile dragons upwards ever changing vertical corridors.
name: High Dragon Tower Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Fly high while facing the dragon menace on the first floors of the tower.
